error.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong!
errorBoundary.description: We've encountered a critical error. Our team has been notified.

placeholder.name: Enter your name
placeholder.professionalExperienceInYears: Enter your years of professional experience
placeholder.jobTitle: e.g., Software Engineer, Data Scientist, Plumber
placeholder.jobDescription: e.g., Developed a company website, led a team, created a new product
placeholder.degree: e.g., Associate Degree in Digital Photography, Bachelor of Arts

landing.subhero: Generate a professional AI-enhanced resume in under 10 minutes – tailored and job-winning!

features.title: Professional Resume Templates
features.description: Choose from our collection of professionally designed templates to make your resume stand out.

minimalistic.title: Minimalist Template
minimalistic.description: A clean and simple design for a professional look.

professional.title: Professional Template
professional.description: A structured and polished design for a corporate feel.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Our simple three-step process helps you create a professional resume in minutes

inputDetails.title: Enter Your Details
inputDetails.description: Provide your professional background and experience with our easy-to-use interface.

aiOptimization.title: AI Optimization
aiOptimization.description: Our advanced AI enhances your resume to maximize your job prospects.

downloadAndApply.title: Download & Apply
downloadAndApply.description: Get an ATS-optimized resume instantly and start applying with confidence.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Answers to frequently asked questions about resugenie

isDataSecure.title: Is My Data Secure?
isDataSecure.description: Absolutely! We prioritize your privacy and work with trusted third-party services like ChatGPT and Supabase to ensure top-tier security.

howDoesAiWork.title: How Does the AI Work?
howDoesAiWork.description: We send your details to ChatGPT for analysis and optimization, ensuring your resume remains authentic while being tailored for ATS systems.

howToSignup.title: How Do I Sign Up?
howToSignup.description: Click 'Create Your Resume' or 'Sign In' at the top right. We currently support Google Sign-In.

readyToLandDreamJob.title: Ready to land your dream job?
readyToLandDreamJob.description: Create your Resume in under 10 minutes now.

signin.title: Sign In to ResuGenie
signin.description: Sign in to access ResuGenie and create your AI-powered resume.
signin.alreadyRegistered: An account with this email already exists. Did you use a different provider last time?

newResumeCard.title: Create a New Resume
newResumeCard.description: Click to start building your resume.

deleteError.title: Error Deleting Resume
deleteError.description: Something went wrong. Please try again.

deleteSuccess.title: Resume Deleted
deleteSuccess.description: Your resume has been successfully deleted.

deletePending.title: Deleting Resume
deletePending.description: Please wait while we delete your resume.

deleteDialog.title: Are You Sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action is irreversible. Your resume will be permanently deleted.

jobAdvertisement.title: Job Advertisement
jobAdvertisement.description: Paste a job advertisement link or enter the details manually.
jobAdvertisement.jobUrlDescription: Paste the job advertisement link to generate a matching resume.
jobAdvertisement.manualDescription: Enter the full job description, including requirements and responsibilities.

personalInformation.title: Personal Information
personalInformation.description: Enter your contact details to get started.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: List your relevant skills for the job.
skills.atLeastOneSkill: Please add at least one skill.

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.description: List your previous jobs and roles.
workExperience.atLeastOneWorkExperience: Please add at least one work experience entry.

education.title: Education
education.atLeastOneEducation: Please add at least one education entry.

downloadResume.title: Pay & Download
downloadResume.description: Purchase the PDF Download of your Resume

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.description: By purchasing, you will unlock the PDF download for this resume. After purchasing, you can still change the layout if you want to.

downloadResume.errorLoadingResume: Failed to fetch resume. Please try again

paymentSuccessfull.title: Payment successful
paymentSuccessfull.description: You are now able to download your resume as PDF

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences.

locale.title: Language
locale.description: Choose your preferred language for the app
